name: Tricky Treats
description:
"Tonight's the big night... Halloween!

Now, I know this isn't a sight most people are used to seeing, a dog trick-or-treating... but desperate times call for desperate measures. With a sick human in bed resting, I'll be on the case to make sure they get their candy!"

Play as a loveable Corgi pup and gather as much candy as you can before Halloween night ends!

Canyon Davidson - Programmer, Gameplay Programmer

Jennifer French - Programmer

Leah C. Holm - 2D Artist, Character Designer

Quela Reyes - Graphic Designer, UI/UX Designer

Schnerby Jacquet - 2D Artist, Background Designer

Shelby LeJuste - 2D Artist
